CustomField.description: Use this option to change the background color of choice based questions. Use hex or RGB color code as a value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Answer Choice Button Background Color allows you to change the background color of choice-based questions in the survey responder interface. You can use a hex or RGB color code as a value to define the desired background color for the answer choice buttons. By customizing this option, you can create a visually appealing and consistent design for the survey interface, enhancing the participant's experience during the survey response process.
CustomField.label: Answer Choice Button Background Color
